text: A rewrite rule modifies the path and the rewrite is confirmed by looking at the rewite log.  The target is a JSP file.  The [PT] option is used and the log reflects this flag.  However, jasper is looking for the .jsp using the original URI path, not the one modified by the rewrite rule.  I think it would be better if jasper used the path modified by the rewrite rule.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Fixed in 3.3 ( optional behavior implemented by Henri should use either 
unparsed_uri or uri - the second will work with rewrite )
